scripts.blog:profile: git config user.name 'Kihyun Ryu' && git config user.email 'khryu0610@gmail.com'
scripts.blog:checkout: git fetch origin blog && ((git branch | grep blog > /dev/null && git checkout blog) || git checkout -b blog origin/blog) && git pull origin blog
scripts.yjshd:profile: git config user.name 'Kihyun Ryu' && git config user.email 'khryu0610@gmail.com'
scripts.yjshd:checkout: git fetch origin yjshd && ((git branch | grep yjshd > /dev/null && git checkout yjshd) || git checkout -b yjshd origin/yjshd) && git pull origin yjshd
scripts.mdx:blog: pnpm blog:profile && pnpm blog:checkout && pnpm mdx
scripts.mdx:yjshd: pnpm yjshd:profile && pnpm yjshd:checkout && pnpm mdx
scripts.콩팥질환정보: pnpm mdx:yjshd create yjshd '3.콩팥질환 강좌' '2.콩팥질환 정보'
